DataElement.preferredName: Study Activity Study Focus Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the activity is a key investigational activity for a study. EXAMPLE(S): A study focused on investigating the effectiveness of a drug will flag the substance administration of the drug or a study focused on determining the average blood pressure of a certain population will flag the blood pressure observation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action, undertaking, or event, which is anticipated to be performed or was performed according to the study protocol during the execution of the study._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action, undertaking, or event, which is anticipated to be performed or was performed according to the study protocol during the execution of the study.

Concepts.definition: An action, undertaking, or event, which is anticipated to be performed or was performed according to the study protocol during the execution of the study.

Property.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
